snippet: The weekend brought no calm to the violent situation in Iraq. Instead, it got worse, with reports of 1,700 Iraqi soldiers being executed by Sunni Islamist militants and two bombs going off in Baghdad.
abstract: The weekend brought no calm to the violent situation in Iraq. Instead, it got worse, with reports of 1,700 Iraqi soldiers being executed by Sunni Islamist militants and two bombs going off in Baghdad.

headline.main: What's News in Washington: Situation in Iraq Worsens
